      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withCustomFunction(CustomFunction function)
      add a custom function instance for the evaluator to recognize
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withCustomFunctions(java.util.Collection<CustomFunction> functions) 
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withExpression(java.lang.String expression)
      set the mathematical expression for parsing
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withOperation(CustomOperator operation)
      set a CustomOperator to be used in the expression
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withOperations(java.util.Collection<CustomOperator> operations)
      set a Collection of CustomOperator to use in the expression
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withVariable(java.lang.String variableName, double value)
      set the value for a variable
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withVariableNames(java.lang.String... variableNames)
      set the variables names used in the expression without setting their values
      ExpressionBuilder ExpressionBuilder.withVariables(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> variableMap)
      set the values for variables
